segments.text: Lester , you are really fantastic at automobile repair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , June . But I think I need to be certified as a mechanic 5 before I ’ m allowed to repair cars for a living .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s not a big problem . There are many small schools for adults like you who can study to be certified .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess I never thought of that before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And you can easily get a student loan from a vocational school , or from the government .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , you ’ Ve inspired me to do something !
segments.speaker: S2
